caption.p: Indirect immunofluorescence microscopy of EV-D68-infected organotypic brain slice cultures. Indirect immunofluorescence microscopy of organotypic brain slice cultures generated from postnatal 4-day-old mice infected with EV-D68 947 isolates. At indicated times, cultures were fixed and stained with antibody to DAPI (blue), anti-EV-D68 VP1 antibody (green), and Nissl stain (purple).
